metadata.description: A Sword and Sorcery story about the redemptive journey of a once cruel king to reclaim his identity. Fallen king Elias is on a quest to reclaim the face that was stolen from him by the mighty sorcerer Melchior.  With the help of an unlikely gang, of all fantastical shapes and sizes, and amidst magic both good and evil, Elias The Cursed will attempt to save his face, and perhaps his soul.
metadata.name: Elias The Cursed
